title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 30 September 2013 - XWiki
content:
<ekarlso> has joined #xwiki  
00:46 <abusenius> has quit  
03:33 <ekarlso> has quit  
07:33 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
07:46 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
08:18 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
08:20 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:21 <ekarlso> has joined #xwiki  
08:26 <ekarlso> has quit  
08:26 <ekarlso> has joined #xwiki  
08:27 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
08:48 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
09:16 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
09:16 <sburjan> vmassol: wdyt about me trying to write some selenium tests for workspaces on XE ?  
09:17 <sburjan> (good morning btw)  
09:33 <vmassol> sburjan: good morning  
09:33 <vmassol> we definitely are missing functional tests of workspaces in platform for sure  
09:34 <vmassol> we have 1 or 2 located in manager but they're not testing much at all  
09:34 <sburjan> ok, I'll try to start with something basic (installing workspaces template from Admin, etc)  
09:34 <sburjan> and the Workspaces creation  
09:45 <vmassol> mflorea: good morning  
09:45 <mflorea> vmassol: good morning  
09:46 <vmassol> mflorea: I'd like to fix the markdown syntaxes to include them in XE  
09:46 <mflorea> good  
09:46 <vmassol> I noticed that right now there's no markdown dep  
09:46 <mflorea> yes, I removed the deps  
09:46 <vmassol> is it because you removed it?  
09:46 <vmassol> ok got it  
09:46 <mflorea> yes, to be able to release  
09:46 <vmassol> it was in enterprise-web right?  
09:46 <mflorea> yep  
09:46 <vmassol> ok  
09:47 <mflorea> https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise/commit/7b25f01299a58ae985a9d16992c0d8cefececaad  
09:47 <vmassol> thanks  
09:52 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
10:19 <vmassol> has quit  
10:21 <msmeria1> has joined #xwiki  
10:24 <msmeria> has quit  
10:26 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
10:42 <vmassol1> has joined #xwiki  
10:44 <vmassol> has quit  
11:15 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
11:43 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
11:46 <msmeria1> tmortagne: hello. can you give me an example on how I could test exporting a wiki as a XAR using WikiStream ? http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotesXWiki52RC1#HExportlargewikisasXARs  
11:46 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
11:46 <msmeria1> I've already uncommented the line in xwiki.cfg  
11:46 <tmortagne> msmeria1: " In the meantime you can try it by uncommenting # xwiki.action.export.xar.usewikistream=1 at the end of xwiki.cfg file."  
11:46 <msmeria1> :)  
11:47 <msmeria1> I did that. What's next ?  
11:47 <tmortagne> just export your wiki  
11:47 <tmortagne> but I may have found a few bug that are fixed on my branch  
11:49 <UCC> has joined #xwiki  
11:55 <tmortagne> msmeria1: in other words wiki stream is used in the /export/ action when you enable it so anything that go trough the export action use wikistream which mean exporting just a page or the standard wiki export UI in admin  
11:57 <msmeria1> I see  
11:57 <tmortagne> (that's why this property name starts with xwiki.action.export)  
11:59 <tmortagne> that's for XAR export, then there is a lot of other things you can do with wikistream but it's more complex and require some advanced scripting but it's not critical you test that for 5.2, unit tests will be better for that and I will write as many as possible during 5.3  
13:11 <polx\_> has joined #xwiki  
13:14 <polx> has quit  
13:14 <polx\_> is now known as <polx>  
13:21 <mflorea> has quit  
13:47 <vmassol1> hmm I don't understand why this build has not been marked as false positive: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-rendering%20Sonar/98/console  
13:47 <vmassol1> actually it was kind of marked since no email was sent  
13:48 <vmassol1> "Email sending was cancelled by user script."  
13:48 <vmassol1> but the UI markers were not added for some reason
